page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: Team sports played by men include football(11 a side),rugby(15 a side), hockey(11 a side) all winter games. Cricket(11 a side)which is a summer game Worcs. has a major cricket team. Women also play hockey and Netball(7 a side)in winter.Some women play cricket /rounders in the summer.Children also play these games. Individual sports include tennis,badminton and squash which are racket games i.e. each player has a racket which is a frame with a network of gut.This is used to hit a ball or object to obtain points. Golf is another popular ball game and can be played by anyone. Other sports such as athletics, swimming, cycling, gymnastics can be participated on either a competitive basis or they can be purely recreational.It is possible to play these sports in the area but facilities are limited generally.
